text: Touch Me Not is a 2018 internationally co-produced drama movie. It was screened in the main competition under the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. It won the Golden Bear Award. The movie mixes fiction and documentary. Touch Me Not is rated NC-17 because of explicit sex. Under Rotten Tomatoes, the movie has a rating of 58% with 33 reviews. Under Metacritic, the movie has a rating of 65 out of 100, meaning "generally favorable reviews". ==Cast== * Laura Benson as herself * TÃ³mas Lemarquis as himself * Dirk Lange as himself * Hanna Hofmann as herself * Christian Bayerlein as himself * Grit Uhlemann as herself * Irmena Chichikova as herself * Adina Pintilie as herself * Seani Love as himself ==References== Category:2018 drama movies Category:NC-17 rated movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Romanian drama movies
title: Touch Me Not
